#' @param name Character (1); the name of the probability distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param signature Character (1); the non-stationary signature (`NULL`, `"10"`, or `"11"`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p Numeric; a vector of probabilities. Must be between 0 and 1.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param params Numeric; a vector of parameters. Must have the correct length for the model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariate Numeric; a vector with the same length as `data`. 

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   Required if `signature` is `"10"` or `"11"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return If `p` or `years` is a scalar, returns a numeric vector. Otherwise, returns a matrix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{qnt-functions}

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' # Initialize p and params

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' p <- runif(n = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' params <- c(0, 1, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' # Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' qntxxx("GEV", NULL, p, params)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats qlnorm qgamma

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
qntxxx <- function(name, signature, p, params, covariate = 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
	# Get the length of the covariate

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    887803x
                    
                      
	n <- length(covariate)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
	# Compute location/scale parameter at the covariate

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    887803x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(signature)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    518500x
                    
                      
		u <- rep(params[1], n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    518500x
                    
                      
		s <- rep(params[2], n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    887803x
                    
                      
	} else if (signature == "10") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    126445x
                    
                      
		u <- params[1] + (covariate * params[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    126445x
                    
                      
		s <- rep(params[3], n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    887803x
                    
                      
	} else if (signature == "11") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    242858x
                    
                      
		u <- params[1] + (covariate * params[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    242858x
                    
                      
		s <- params[3] + (covariate * params[4])

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
	# Compute the shape parameter if the model has one

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    887803x
                    
                      
	if (name %in% c("GEV", "GEV", "GLO", "GNO", "PE3", "LP3", "WEI")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    525205x
                    
                      
		k <- rep(params[length(params)], n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
	# Add two shape parameters for the Kappa distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    887803x
                    
                      
	if (name == "KAP") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    2e+05x
                    
                      
		k <- rep(params[3], n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    2e+05x
                    
                      
		h <- rep(params[4], n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for GUM quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfgum <- function(p, u, s) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    113732x
                    
                      
		u - s * log(-log(p))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for NOR quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfnor <- function(p, u, s) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    25086x
                    
                      
		qnorm(p, u, s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for LNO quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xflno <- function(p, u, s) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    23780x
                    
                      
		qlnorm(p, u, s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for GEV quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfgev <- function(p, u, s, k) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    684963x
                    
                      
		if (k != 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    684954x
                    
                      
			u - s * (1 - (-log(p))^-k) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
		} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    9x
                    
                      
			u - s * log(-log(p))

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for GLO quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfglo <- function(p, u, s, k) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    29865x
                    
                      
		if (k != 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    29697x
                    
                      
			u + s * (1 - ((1 - p) / p)^k) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
		} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    2x
                    
                      
			u - s * log((1 - p) / p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for GNO quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfgno <- function(p, u, s, k) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    29981x
                    
                      
		if (k != 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    29946x
                    
                      
			u + s * (1 - exp(-k * qnorm(p))) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
		} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    1x
                    
                      
			qnorm(p, u, s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for PE3 quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfpe3 <- function(p, u, s, k) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
		# Reparameterize in terms of a, b	

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    187207x
                    
                      
		a <- 4 / (k^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    187207x
                    
                      
		b <- abs((s * k) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
		# Vectorize three cases (k = 0, k > 0, k < 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    187207x
                    
                      
		if (k == 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    4x
                    
                      
			qnorm(p, u, s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    187207x
                    
                      
		} else if (k > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    170973x
                    
                      
			u - (a * b) + qgamma(p, shape = a, scale = b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    187207x
                    
                      
		} else if (k < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    15064x
                    
                      
			u + (a * b) - qgamma(1 - p, shape = a, scale = b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for LP3 quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xflp3 <- function(p, u, s, k) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    17096x
                    
                      
		exp(xfpe3(p, u, s, k))

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for WEI quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfwei <- function(p, u, s, k) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    98494x
                    
                      
		u + s * ((-log(1 - p))^(1/ k))

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for KAP quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfkap <- function(p, u, s, k, h) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    2e+05x
                    
                      
		u + (s / k) * (1 - ((1 - p^h) / h)^k)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
	# General helper function for all quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    887803x
                    
                      
	xfxxx <- switch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    887803x
                    
                      
		name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    887803x
                    
                      
		GUM = function(p, i) xfgum(p, u[i], s[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    887803x
                    
                      
		NOR = function(p, i) xfnor(p, u[i], s[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    887803x
                    
                      
		LNO = function(p, i) xflno(p, u[i], s[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    887803x
                    
                      
		GEV = function(p, i) xfgev(p, u[i], s[i], k[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    887803x
                    
                      
		GLO = function(p, i) xfglo(p, u[i], s[i], k[i]), 

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    887803x
                    
                      
		GNO = function(p, i) xfgno(p, u[i], s[i], k[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    887803x
                    
                      
		PE3 = function(p, i) xfpe3(p, u[i], s[i], k[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    887803x
                    
                      
		LP3 = function(p, i) xflp3(p, u[i], s[i], k[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    887803x
                    
                      
		WEI = function(p, i) xfwei(p, u[i], s[i], k[i]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    887803x
                    
                      
		KAP = function(p, i) xfkap(p, u[i], s[i], k[i], h[i])

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
	# Compute the result using apply across rows 

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    887803x
                    
                      
	result <- vapply(1:n, function(i) xfxxx(p, i), numeric(length(p)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
	# Collapse the result to a vector if possible

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    886437x
                    
                      
	if (length(p) == 1 | length(covariate) == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    881433x
                    
                      
		return (as.vector(result))

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
	} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    5004x
                    
                      
		return (t(result))

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Log-Likelihood Helper Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function used by \link{llv-functions}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @note 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' This function does not perform parameter validation, which improves performance

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' at the cost of potentially unpredictable behaviour. Use at your own risk.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param name Character (1); the name of the probability distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param signature Character (1); the non-stationary signature (`NULL`, `"10"`, or `"11"`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data Numeric; a vector of annual maximum streamflow data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param params Numeric; a vector of parameters. Must have the correct length for the model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariate Numeric; a vector with the same length as `data`. 

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   Required if `signature` is `"10"` or `"11"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Numeric (1); the log-likelihood value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{llv-functions}

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' # Initialize data and params

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' params <- c(0, 1, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' # Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' llvxxx("GEV", NULL, data, params)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
llvxxx <- function(name, signature, data, params, covariate = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
	# Minimal amount of error handling to prevent issues during MLE estimation

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    2553252x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(params))) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(data))) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
	# Parse the stationary/non-stationary signature

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
	# - u: mu (location parameter)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
	# - s: sigma (scale parameter)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
	# - k: kappa (shape parameter)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(signature)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    488719x
                    
                      
		u <- params[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    488719x
                    
                      
		s <- params[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (signature == "10") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1767137x
                    
                      
		u <- params[1] + (covariate * params[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    1767137x
                    
                      
		s <- params[3]

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (signature == "11") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    297240x
                    
                      
		u <- params[1] + (covariate * params[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    297240x
                    
                      
		s <- params[3] + (covariate * params[4])

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	if (name %in% c("GEV", "GLO", "GNO", "PE3", "LP3", "WEI")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    2346151x
                    
                      
		k <- params[length(params)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
	# Ensure that the scale parameter is positive

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	if (any(s <= 0)) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
	# Distribution functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	if (name == "GUM") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
		

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
		# Normalize the data

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    139212x
                    
                      
		z <- ((data - u) / s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
		

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    139212x
                    
                      
		ll <- -log(s) - z - exp(-z)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (name == "NOR") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
		# Normalize the data

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    29391x
                    
                      
		z <- ((data - u) / s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    29391x
                    
                      
		ll <- -log(s * sqrt(2 * pi)) - (z^2 / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (name == "LNO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
		# Normalize log(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    38342x
                    
                      
		log_z <- ((log(data) - u) / s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
		# Subtract log(data) from ll because of the chain rule.

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    38342x
                    
                      
		ll <- -log(s * sqrt(2 * pi)) - (log_z^2 / 2) - log(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (name == "GEV") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
		# Get the shape-normalized data

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1896560x
                    
                      
		t <- 1 + k * ((data - u) / s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support and then compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    1896560x
                    
                      
		if (any(t <= 0)) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    1889045x
                    
                      
		ll <- -log(s) - (1 + (1 / k)) * log(t) - t^(-1 / k)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (name == "GLO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
		# Get the shape-normalized data

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    10735x
                    
                      
		t <- 1 - k * ((data - u) / s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support and then compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    10735x
                    
                      
		if (any(t <= 0)) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    10083x
                    
                      
		ll <- -log(s) + ((1 / k) - 1) * log(t) - 2 * log(1 + t^(1 / k))

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
	} 

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	else if (name == "GNO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
		# Get the shape-normalized data

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    94439x
                    
                      
		t <- 1 - k * ((data - u) / s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support and then compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    94439x
                    
                      
		if (any(t <= 0)) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    93181x
                    
                      
		ll <- -log(s * sqrt(2 * pi)) - log(t) - (log(t)^2 / (2 * k^2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (name == "PE3") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
		# Reparameterize

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    162213x
                    
                      
		a <- 4 / (k^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    162213x
                    
                      
		b <- s * abs(k) / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    162213x
                    
                      
		x <- u - (2 * s) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support 

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    162213x
                    
                      
		if ((k > 0 & any(data <= x)) | (k < 0 & any(data >= x))) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    155468x
                    
                      
		t <- abs(data - x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    155468x
                    
                      
		ll <- (a - 1) * log(t) - (t / b) - a * log(b) - lgamma(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (name == "LP3") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
		# Reparameterize

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    101579x
                    
                      
		a <- 4 / (k^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    101579x
                    
                      
		b <- s * abs(k) / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    101579x
                    
                      
		x <- u - (2 * s) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    101579x
                    
                      
		if ((k > 0 & any(log(data) <= x)) | (k < 0 & any(log(data) >= x))) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    100750x
                    
                      
		t <- abs(log(data) - x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    100750x
                    
                      
		ll <- (a - 1) * log(t) - (t / b) - a * log(b) - lgamma(a) - log(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    2553096x
                    
                      
	} else if (name == "WEI") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    80625x
                    
                      
		if (k <= 0 | any(data <= u)) return (-Inf) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
		

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    80556x
                    
                      
		t <- data - u

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    80556x
                    
                      
		ll <- log(k) - k * log(s) + (k - 1) * log(t) - (t / s)^k

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
	# The sum of the log-likelihood over all data points is the total log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    2536028x
                    
                      
	sum(ll)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Helper Function for L-moments Ratios

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function used by \link{lmr-functions}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @note L-moment ratios for `NOR`/`LNO` and `PE3`/`LP3` are identical

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'   since it is assumed that the `LNO`/`LP3` L-moments will be compared

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'   to the sample L-moments of the logarithm of the data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param model Character; `GUM`, `NOR`, `LNO`, `GEV`, `GLO`, `GNO`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   `PE3`, `LP3`, or `WEI`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param params Numeric; a vector of parameters. 

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' - Numeric (2) if `model` is `GUM`, `NOR`, or `LNO`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' - Numeric (3) if `model` is `GEV`, `GLO`, `GNO`, `PE3`, `LP3`, or `WEI`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A numeric vector of length 4 containing:

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\lambda_1}: L-mean

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\lambda_2}: L-variance

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\tau_3}: L-skewness

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\tau_4}: L-kurtosis

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' Hosking, J.R.M. & Wallis, J.R., 1997. Regional frequency analysis: an approach based 

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' on L-Moments. Cambridge University Press, New York, USA.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' lmrxxx("GLO", c(0, 1, 0))

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
lmrxxx <- function(model, params) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
	# Unpack the parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    260887x
                    
                      
	u <- params[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    260887x
                    
                      
	s <- params[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    260887x
                    
                      
	if (length(params) == 3) k <- params[3]

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
	# NOTE: -digamma(1) is Euler's constant (~0.5772)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    260887x
                    
                      
	if (model == "GUM") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    17x
                    
                      
		l1 <- u - (s * digamma(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    17x
                    
                      
		l2 <- s * log(2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    17x
                    
                      
		t3 <- log(9 / 8) / log(2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    17x
                    
                      
		t4 <- (16 * log(2) - 10 * log(3)) / log(2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
	# NOTE: We call lmrxxx("LNO", params) internally to compare the L-moments of log(data) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
	# to the L-moments for NOR. We can do this because Data ~ LNO <=> log(Data) ~ NOR.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    260887x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "NOR" | model == "LNO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    32x
                    
                      
		l1 <- u

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    32x
                    
                      
		l2 <- s * pi^-0.5

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    32x
                    
                      
		t3 <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    32x
                    
                      
		t4 <- (30 * pi^-1 * atan(sqrt(2))) - 9

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    260887x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "GEV") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    54558x
                    
                      
		l1 <- u + s * (1 - gamma(1 + k)) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    54558x
                    
                      
		l2 <- s * (1 - 2^-k) * gamma(1 + k) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    54558x
                    
                      
		t3 <- 2 * (1 - 3^-k) / (1 - 2^-k) - 3

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    54558x
                    
                      
		t4 <- (5 * (1 - 4^-k) - 10 * (1 - 3^-k) + 6 * (1 - 2^-k)) / (1 - 2^-k)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    260887x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "GLO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    6436x
                    
                      
		l1 <- u + s * ((1 / k) - (pi / sin(k * pi)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    6436x
                    
                      
		l2 <- (s * k * pi) / sin(k * pi)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    6436x
                    
                      
		t3 <- -k

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    6436x
                    
                      
		t4 <- (1 + (5 * k^2)) / 6

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    260887x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "GNO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
		# Constants for numerical approximation

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    24467x
                    
                      
		Tau04 <- 0.12260172

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    24467x
                    
                      
		A0 <-  0.4886025

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    24467x
                    
                      
		A1 <-  4.4493076e-3

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    24467x
                    
                      
		A2 <-  8.8027039e-4

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    24467x
                    
                      
		A3 <-  1.1507084e-6

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    24467x
                    
                      
		B1 <-  6.4662924e-2

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    24467x
                    
                      
		B2 <-  3.3090406e-3

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    24467x
                    
                      
		B3 <-  7.4290680e-5

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    24467x
                    
                      
		C0 <-  0.1875659

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    24467x
                    
                      
		C1 <- -2.5352147e-3

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    24467x
                    
                      
		C2 <-  2.6995102e-4

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    24467x
                    
                      
		C3 <- -1.8446680e-6

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    24467x
                    
                      
		D1 <-  8.2325617e-2

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    24467x
                    
                      
		D2 <-  4.2681448e-3

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    24467x
                    
                      
		D3 <-  1.1653690e-4

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute L-moments

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    24467x
                    
                      
		l1 <- u + s * (1 - exp(k^2 / 2)) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    24467x
                    
                      
		l2 <- (s / k) * exp(k^2 / 2) * (1 - 2 * pnorm(-k / sqrt(2)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    24467x
                    
                      
		t3a <- A0 + A1 * k^2 + A2 * k^4 + A3 * k^6

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    24467x
                    
                      
		t3b <- 1 + B1 * k^2 + B2 * k^4 + B3 * k^6

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    24467x
                    
                      
		t3 <- -k * (t3a / t3b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    24467x
                    
                      
		t4a <- C0 + C1 * k^2 + C2 * k^4 + C3 * k^6

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    24467x
                    
                      
		t4b <- 1 + D1 * k^2 + D2 * k^4 + D3 * k^6

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    24467x
                    
                      
		t4 <- Tau04 + k^2 * (t4a / t4b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
	

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
	# NOTE: We call lmrxxx("LP3", params) internally to compare the L-moments of log(data) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
	# to the L-moments for PE3 We can do this because Data ~ LP3 <=> log(Data) ~ PE3.

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    260887x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "PE3" | model == "LP3") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
		

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
		# Coefficients used for approximation

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    120885x
                    
                      
		A0 <-  3.2573501e-1

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    120885x
                    
                      
		A1 <-  1.6869150e-1

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    120885x
                    
                      
		A2 <-  7.8327243e-2

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    120885x
                    
                      
		A3 <- -2.9120539e-3

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    120885x
                    
                      
		B1 <-  4.6697102e-1

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    120885x
                    
                      
		B2 <-  2.4255406e-1

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    120885x
                    
                      
		C0 <-  1.2260172e-1

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    120885x
                    
                      
		C1 <-  5.3730130e-2

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    120885x
                    
                      
		C2 <-  4.3384378e-2

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    120885x
                    
                      
		C3 <-  1.1101277e-2

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    120885x
                    
                      
		D1 <-  1.8324466e-1

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    120885x
                    
                      
		D2 <-  2.0166036e-1

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    120885x
                    
                      
		E1 <-  2.3807576

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    120885x
                    
                      
		E2 <-  1.5931792

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    120885x
                    
                      
		E3 <-  1.1618371e-1
