                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    6x
                    
                      
	if (!quiet) message(msg)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
	# Return the results as a list

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    6x
                    
                      
	list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    6x
                    
                      
		n = n,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    6x
                    
                      
		n.plus = np,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    6x
                    
                      
		n.minus = nm,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    6x
                    
                      
		runs = runs,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    6x
                    
                      
		statistic = z,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    6x
                    
                      
		p.value = p_value,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    6x
                    
                      
		residuals = residuals,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    6x
                    
                      
		reject = reject,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    6x
                    
                      
		msg = msg

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Parameter Estimation with L-Moments

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Estimate the parameters of one of nine different distributions (`GUM`, `NOR`, 

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `LNO`, `GEV`, `GLO`, `GNO`, `PE3`, `LP3`, and `WEI`) using the method of L-moments. 

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data Numeric; a vector of annual maximum streamflow data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @details 

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' First, the sample L-moments of the data are computed using the \link{lmom.sample} 

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' method. Then formulas from Hosking (1997) are used to compute the parameters from the

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' L-moments. Distributions `GNO`, `PE3`, and `LP3` use a rational approximation to compute

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' the parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Numeric; a vector of parameters. 

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' Hosking, J.R.M. & Wallis, J.R., 1997. Regional frequency analysis: an approach based 

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' on L-Moments. Cambridge University Press, New York, USA.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' pellp3(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @name pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    5x
                    
                      
pelgum <- function(data) pelxxx("GUM", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    5x
                    
                      
pelnor <- function(data) pelxxx("NOR", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    5x
                    
                      
pellno <- function(data) pelxxx("LNO", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    5x
                    
                      
pelgev <- function(data) pelxxx("GEV", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    5x
                    
                      
pelglo <- function(data) pelxxx("GLO", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    5x
                    
                      
pelgno <- function(data) pelxxx("GNO", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    5x
                    
                      
pelpe3 <- function(data) pelxxx("PE3", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    5x
                    
                      
pellp3 <- function(data) pelxxx("LP3", data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pel-functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    5x
                    
                      
pelwei <- function(data) pelxxx("WEI", data)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Mann–Kendall–Sneyers (MKS) Test Results

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Constructs a two‐panel visualization of the MKS test. The upper panel plots the 

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' normalized progressive and regressive Mann–Kendall S‐statistics over time, with 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' dashed confidence bounds and potential trend‐change points. The lower panel 

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' contains the annual maximum streamflow (AMS) data with the change points highlighted

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' points along with an optional trend line.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data Numeric; a vector of annual maximum streamflow data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param years Numeric; a vector of years with the same length as `data`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param results List; results of the MKS test, generated by \link{mks.test}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param show_trend Logical; if TRUE (default), draw a fitted line through the AMS data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return \code{patchwork}; A plot object with two \code{ggplot2} panels stacked vertically.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- mks.test(data, years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' mks.plot(data, years, results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{mks.test}

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @import ggplot2

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @import patchwork

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
mks.plot <- function(data, years, results, show_trend = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
	# Create a dataframe for the bounds

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    1x
                    
                      
	bound_df <- data.frame(y = c(-results$bound, results$bound))

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
	# Create the plotting dataframe

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1x
                    
                      
	df <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1x
                    
                      
		max = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    1x
                    
                      
		year = years,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1x
                    
                      
		s.progressive = results$s.progressive,

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
		s.regressive = results$s.regressive

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
	# Define labels for the plot 

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
	ut_label <- "Normalized Trend Statistic"

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
	flow_label <- expression(AMS ~ m^3/s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1x
                    
                      
	series_labels <- c("Progressive Series", "Regressive Series")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
	# Plot the normalized trend statistics and confidence bands

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
	p1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = .data$year)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_line(aes(color = "black", y = .data$s.progressive), linewidth = 1.2) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_line(aes(color = "gray",  y = .data$s.regressive), linewidth = 1.2) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_hline(

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
			data = bound_df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
			aes(yintercept = .data$y, color = "red"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
			linewidth = 1.2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
			linetype = "dashed",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
		) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_point(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
			data = results$change.df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
			aes(x =.data$years, y = .data$statistic, color = "blue"), 

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
			size = 4

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
		) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
		labs(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
			title = "Mann-Kendall-Sneyers Test",

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
			x = "Year",

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
			y = ut_label,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
			color = "Legend"

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
		) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
		scale_color_manual(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    1x
                    
                      
			values = c("black" = "black","gray" = "gray","blue" = "blue","red" = "red"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    1x
                    
                      
			breaks = c("black", "gray", "red", "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
			labels = c(series_labels, "Confidence Bounds", "Potential Trend Change")

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
		)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
	# Plot the change points on the original dataset

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
	p2 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = .data$year, y = .data$max)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_point(aes(color = "black"), size = 2.25) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
		(if (show_trend) geom_line(color = "black", linewidth = 1.1) else NULL) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_point(

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
			data = results$change.df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
			aes(x = .data$years, y = .data$max, color = "blue"), 

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
			size = 4

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
		) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
		labs(x = "Year", y = flow_label, color = "Legend") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
		scale_color_manual(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
			values = c("black" = "black", "blue" = "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    1x
                    
                      
			breaks = c("black", "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
			labels = c(flow_label, "Potential Trend Change")

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
		)	

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
	# Stack plots on top of each other and return

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    1x
                    
                      
	add_theme(add_scales(p1)) / add_theme(add_scales(p2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
	

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Model Assessment Results

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Creates a quantile–quantile plot comparing observed annual maximum streamflow (AMS)

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' data to quantile estimates from a fitted parametric model. The 1:1 line is drawn in 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' black and the model estimates are plotted as semi‐transparent red points.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data Numeric; a vector of annual maximum streamflow data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assessment List; model assessment results generated by \link{model.assessment}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return \code{ggplot}; a plot containing:

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   - A black line for the theoretical 1:1 relationship between observed and model quantiles.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Red points marking the estimated quantiles against the observed quantiles.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' # Initialize example data, years, and params

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' params <- c(100, 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' # Perform uncertainty analysis

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' uncertainty <- sb.uncertainty(data, years, "NOR", "L-moments")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' # Perform model assessment

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' assessment <- model.assessment(data, years, "NOR", params, uncertainty)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' # Generate a model assessment plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' assessment.plot(data, assessment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @import ggplot2

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
assessment.plot <- function(data, assessment) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
	# Create a dataframe for the plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    1x
                    
                      
	x <- data[order(data, decreasing = TRUE)]   

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1x
                    
                      
	df <- data.frame(x = x, y = x, estimates = assessment$estimates) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
	# Get labels for the plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1x
                    
                      
	x_label <- expression(Model ~ Quantiles ~ m^3/s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
	y_label <- expression(Observed ~ Quantiles ~ m^3/s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
	# Generate the plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
	p1 <- ggplot(data = df) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_line(aes(x = x, y = .data$y), linewidth = 1.1) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
		geom_point(aes(x = x, y = .data$estimates), color = "red", size = 3, alpha = 0.5) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1x
                    
                      
		labs(x = x_label, y = y_label, title = "Model Assessment")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
	# Add theme and scales and return

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
	add_theme(add_scales(p1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
}
